fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During a Full Moon, become Enraged and rampage at your target's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you don't select a target, you will rampage at your own house on Full Moon Nights.
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- Any transfur attempts from the latex faction will always succeed.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: NK goal, But you may win as a Survivor alongside Werewolf (98), Werewolves (Faction), Scp, Thundercry, Pok√©mon, Foxes, Koopas, Beasts, Beekeepers, Latex, Frogs, Monkeys, Faunae, Locusts, Mutants, Animatronics, any faction that has an alive Animal/Furry related role, Vulblaze and Chomps.
